# payload

**Instance Property**

The payload to use for accessory setup.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var payload: HMAccessorySetupPayload? { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessorySetupPayload] for more information.

## Setting up accessorices

- **homeUniqueIdentifier**: The identifier corresponding to the home that the accessory should be added to when being set up.
- **suggestedAccessoryName**: The name that the framework suggests when the user names the accessory being set up.
- **suggestedRoomUniqueIdentifier**: The identifier corresponding to the room that the framework suggests.
